official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the support of the Congress for the Alaska Natural Gas Transportation System and for further consideration of waivers of law regarding that System.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the timely completion of the Alaska Natural Gas Transportation System is important and that a revised set of waivers of law should be expeditiously considered.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the support of the Congress for the Alaska Natural Gas Transportation System and for further consideration of waivers of law regarding that System.
